::Zardus/Bloodystrike/Reptilica/DevilDuer/WarMachine::

One of the shots from the big autogun heads for Zardus. Not enough time to 
dive under it, the Alliance commander puts up his hands to block the shot, 
his launcher overloading and shutting down.

Calmly, he replaces his broken weapon with an automatic rifle, firing two 
dozen bolts at the big autogun.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Two missiles hit trees near Bloodystrike, the Alliance bot diving for cover. 
He looks at Sharpedge through the foliage, firing a missile at the bot.

One missile left in the missile launcher, Bloodystrike puts it away, taking 
out his rifle.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica flies upward, a few optic shots hitting his legs but the majority 
of the firepower passing under him.

He turns to look at Jetstorm, firing two missiles at the bot.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer emerges from the forest at the Alliance base, looking around.

"Hey," he says, walking up to Serpentor, Nemesis, and Scattershot, "There's 
still a battle goin' on at those guys' base. If yer not too damaged, you can 
help. Zardus asked me to clean up here, though."

He turns his head, looking at Vampra's body on the ground. Walking over to 
her, he picks her up, entering the base and heading toward the CR chambers.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
WarMachine flinched as Mobster's shots dug into him, leaving scorch marks. He 
was starting to lose mechfluid at a fast rate, as well as quickly running low 
on energy.

Aiming his gun at the bot's chest, he pulls the trigger, a couple of missiles 
along with alot of plasma shots streaming out toward the enemy gestalt's 
chest.
